long_description: The military-inspired Suunto Spartan Multifunction Watch packs an altimeter, barometer, stopwatch, countdown timer and dual time into a durable wrist-top timepiece that can be operated underwater. Buttons are operable underwater, down to 33 ft. (10m). Altimeter and barometer with 4-day barometric memory. The Suunto Spartan Multifunction Watch features a backlight, black aluminum casing, black rubber strap and user-replacable battery. Closeout.
short_description: The military-inspired Suunto Spartan Multifunction Watch packs an altimeter, barometer, stopwatch, countdown timer and dual time into a durable wrist-top timepiece that can be operated underwater.
